stimulusHtml: What is printed as a result of executing the code segment?

features.html:
Consider the following code segment. 

 

int count = 0; 
for (String word : wordList) 
{ 
   if (word.indexOf("a") >= 0) 
   { 
      count++; 
   } 
} 
System.out.println(count);

 

Assume that the  ArrayList  wordList  has been initialized to contain the  String  values  ["apple", "banana", "coconut", "lemon", "orange", "pear"].
